name: AURORA
summary:
At the age of six Aurora hit her head and fell asleep.

Unfortunately she never woke up.

She never understood anything the people around her where saying, the only thing she could make out.

Was the lovely fairy tales her mother told her every morning.

Though it seemed that, as the years passed, the girl grew restless and her mind wondered…

Over the long horizon

Far…Far…Far…Away

Too far away…

Do you, feel this as right?

Do you accept it?

Accept this...

Do you refuse to accept the truth?...
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Adventure
  • 游戏引擎: RPG Maker VX Ace
  • 官方网站: https://rpgmaker.net/games/7383/
